article.title: The Deltocephalinae leafhoppers of Pakistan (Hemiptera, Cicadellidae)
article.abstract: The deltocephaline leafhoppers (Hemiptera: Cicadellidae) of Pakistan are reviewed and a key to tribes and a checklist is provided. Two new species are described: Bampurius pakistanicus sp. nov. and Neolimnus quadricornis sp. nov. 16 new synonymies and four new combinations are proposed and a total of 31 genera and 57 species are recorded.

indexing.subject: Auchenorrhyncha; morphology; taxonomy; new species; new records

article.title: Protonemura gevi sp. n., a cavernicolous new species of stonefly (Insecta: Plecoptera)
article.abstract: A new species of Plecoptera, Protonemura gevi sp. n., is described from both adults and nymphs from the Southern Iberian Peninsula. It is quite probable that this species finishes its entire life cycle within a 60 m deep cave. Morphologically, P. gevi is brachypterous, has extremely long antennae, and has small eyes, all features that may have been accentuated in a cave environment.

indexing.subject: Protonemura gevi sp. n., Nemouridae; adult; nymph; cave; Iberian Peninsula

article.title: Anacroneuria (Plecoptera, Perlidae) from the Mantiqueira Mountains, São Paulo State, Brazil
article.abstract: Seven species of Anacroneuria Klapálek are considered; of these 4 were known, A. debilis (Pictet, 1841), A. flintorum Froehlich, 2002, A. toriba Froehlich, 2002 (the female is described herein), and A. vanini Froehlich, 2004. Three are new: A. mantiqueirae, A. simulans, and A. tabatae.

indexing.subject: Stoneflies; Campos do Jordão; Anacroneuria; Brazil; São Paulo
